game.name: StealthTag
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Stealth Tag is a 1-4 player social deduction game that blends fast-paced action with clever strategy. Outsmart your pursuers, track down your target, and master a variety of abilities to tip the scales in your favor. Rely on stealth, cunning, and quick thinking to rack up your score.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Stealth Tag is a 1-4 player social deduction game that blends fast-paced action with clever strategy. Outsmart your pursuers, track down your target, and master a variety of abilities to tip the scales in your favor. Rely on stealth, cunning, and quick thinking to rack up your score.
